item.title: Now
item.description: I am currently based in Brooklyn, NY attending the Recurse Center, a self-directed educational retreat for programmers looking to improve their skills. While at Recurse, I have been exploring my listening history via the Spotify APIs, recreating the Sol LeWitt’s conceptual art pieces with Processing JS, and dabbling in functional programming with Elm. My Recurse batch (Spring 1, ‘19) ends in early May, and I will be pursuing a full-time gig as a software engineer in the greater New York City area.
